title: "Amazon's AWS to launch Saudi Arabia data centers, invest over $5.3 bln"
excerpt: "March 4 (Reuters) - Amazon.com's AMZN.O cloud division Amazon Web Services said on Monday it will launch data centers in Saudi Arabia in 2026 and plans to invest more than $5.3 billion in the kingdom. The cloud region will enable customers to securely store content and run workloads while offering higher speed for its users."
